extendedInfo.description: This app takes three pictures with single shutter action.Then, the app automatically select the picture that is the most clear and save it.( Others are not saved.)That is, this app acts like stabilizer( Anti-blur , Anti-shake) .If you always take pictures with some shutters, this app is good for you.This camera app is based on ICS camera app.So basic camera functions are supported.And this app supports silent mode.(But it may not work depend on your phone.)*This app acts like stabilizer. But, it's not stabilizer strictly.So, anti-shake picture can be expected to get. But this app cannot get anti-shake picture when the hands are shaking throughout taking pictures.ã

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: I use Clearcam on iPhone, and this is a great android alternative.   If you have the time, it would be awesome to add the enhanced mode of Clearcam which analyses the clearest pictures of the 3-5 and aligns them Into one higher resolution photo.   Anyways,  glad this app exists! Default for sure.
reviews.author: linda stoeckel

reviews.title: excellent quality
reviews.comment: great focus and stabilizer, makes the picture look great and simple Ui design, love it. #justfoundmynewcameraapp
reviews.author: Isaac Marcus Lam

reviews.title: Great!!!
reviews.comment: Last time i could not take pictures of printed text properly, but now i could. Keep up the good work!!!
reviews.author: Nelson Tan

reviews.title: Doesnt work! On my canvas hd 4.2
reviews.comment: It says sm error on taking a shot. Fix it! Or else idk wht wud happen to ur app.
